title: The pleasant comodie of patient Grisill As it hath beene sundrie times lately plaid by the right honorable the Earle of Nottingham (Lord high Admirall) his seruants.
author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
publisher: Imprinted [by E. Allde] for Henry Rocket, and are to be solde at the long shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultry,
notes: By Thomas Dekker, Henry Chettle, and William Haughton.
Based on day 10, novel 10 of: Boccaccio, Giovanni. Decamerone.
Running title reads: The pleasant commody of patient Grisill.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
